definition: of or relating to Bolshevism, emotionally charged terms used to refer to extreme radicals or revolutionaries
details:
adjective
- of or relating to Bolshevism
= example: of or relating to Bolshevism
= synonyms: Bolshevist, Bolshevistic
noun
- emotionally charged terms used to refer to extreme radicals or revolutionaries
= synonyms: Marxist
